verbose_text: Each 50 seed sample was subjected to amplification in 10 mul PCR reactions consisting of 5 mul Perfecta Custom Genotyping Toughmix master mix (Quanta Biosciences, Inc., Beverly, MA, USA), 0.1 mul each of the two CP4 EPSPS product primers at 100 muM concentration, 0.02 mul of the event probe at 100 muM, 12 ng template DNA plus proper amount of water to make up 10 mul.
